data.title: Examples of "Starred" in a Sentence
data.meta_description: Learn how to use "starred" in a sentence with 280 example sentences on YourDictionary.
data.text:
The stars are beautiful and ever-present, as they're visible from every place on Earth (and beyond). With that in mind, it's not surprising that sayings involving or about stars often find their way into literature, songs and other creative works. When you're looking for an uplifting, positive phrase, consider incorporating star quotes into your messages.

Learning about space can be exciting and confusing. Start your discovery of astronomy with a cool and simple glossary of space terms kids and adults can understand.
